name: Tech Invaders TD
description:
In Tech Invaders are your task, to kill the hackers with Annoing Child, an Expert Team, A SoMe Army and many others!

Basic Game
In the basis Tower Defence part of the game, are your mision to kill all the hackers in the 20+ maps. When you complete 1 map, you will get Coins, XP and maby Gems! For the Coins can you buy Bonus Levels And gems can you use for Game Upgrades!

Basic Game - Features
- Buy Bonuslevels
- Upgrade your count of defenders
- Play over 20 maps
- No ads


Expert Team
When you reach level 20, can you upgrade a Tech Expert, as you can use ingame. If it is fully upgraded, can it insta-kill some hackers

Expert Team - Features
- Upgrade Range
- Upgrade Damage
- Upgrade Speed


So what are you waiting for? Buy and Play Tech Invaders NOW! (From 7/10)
